data.value: Bad sort order on volumes detected

data.value: When using cleanup the manifests and hashes must be verified

data.value: Deleting backup at {0}

data.name: DeprecatedOptionUsedWarning
data.value: The option {0} is deprecated: {1}

data.value: The option --{0} exists more than once, please report this to the developers

data.value: Failed to find control files in: {0}

data.name: FileHashFailure
data.value: A hash check failed, this is an indication of a corrupt file: {0}

data.name: FilesAreNotForceDeletedMessage
data.value: Files are not deleted, use the --force command to actually remove files

data.name: InternalDeleteCountError
data.value: An internal error occured, and the operation was aborted to protect the backup sets

data.name: ManifestsMustBeReadOnBackups
data.value: It is not allowed to disable manifest reading when performing a backup. Disabling manifests is only possible on restores, and it should only be used as a last resort.

data.name: MissingSignatureFile
data.value: The signature file for a content volume was missing, date: {0}, volumenumber: {1}, content volume filename: {2}

data.name: NoSourceFoldersError
data.value: No source folders specified for backup

data.name: NotDeletingBackupSetMessage
data.value: Not deleting backup at time: {0}, because later backups depend on it

data.name: NotDeletingLastFullMessage
data.value: The backup at time {0} is not removed because it is the last full backup, use --allow-full-removal to include this backup in the delete

data.name: NumberOfSourceFoldersHasChangedError
data.value: The number of source folders in the latest backup is {0}, but the number of specified folders is now {1}. It is not allowed to change source folders for a backup.

data.name: PartialUploadMessage
data.value: Failed after uploading {0} volume(s). Error message: {1}

data.name: PrimaryManifestReadErrorLogMessage
data.value: Failed to read the primary manifest {0}, attempting secondary, if available. Error message: {1}

data.value: Secondary manifest file found: {0}, attempting read.

data.name: RemovingPartialFilesMessage
data.value: Removing partial file: {0}

data.value: Failed to read the secondary manifest {0}. Error message: {1}

data.name: SignatureCachePathMissingError
data.value: Signature cache path was not given as an argument

data.name: SkippedContentVolumeLogMessage
data.value: The content volume {0} is not present in the manifest and is not used

data.name: SourceDirIsIncludedMultipleTimesError
data.value: The folder {0} is included multiple times

data.name: SourceDirsAreRelatedError
data.value: The folder {1} is a subfolder of {0}. It is not allowed to specify the same folder multiple times.

data.name: SourceFolderIsMissingError
data.value: The source folder {0} does not exist, aborting backup

data.name: SourceFoldersHasChangedError
data.value: The folder {0} is no longer in the source folder set. It is not allowed to change source folders for a backup.
